casebody.data:
Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Palmer.

[Cite as Disciplinary Counsel v. Palmer (1994), 71 Ohio St.3d 174.]

*175(No. 94-1858 Submitted October 24, 1994 Decided December 14, 1994.) *176Geoffrey Stem, Disciplinary Counsel, and Sally Ann Steuk, Assistant Disciplinary Counsel, for relator. Per Curiam.

We concur in the findings and recommendations of the board. Respondent is hereby indefinitely suspended from the practice of law in Ohio. Costs taxed to respondent.

Judgment accordingly.

Moyer, C.J., A.W. Sweeney, Douglas, Wright, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., concur.
